path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(250, 104, 0), rgb(233, 107, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(199, 53, 0), rgb(255, 145, 100));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 271px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
